Embedded Reporting Data Schema

pending_action Table

This table lists the latest actions that have been recommended by the market. The table repopulates at a configurable interval (not necessarily every 10-minute market cycle). When it repopulates, all actions are replaced with the latest action recommendations.

This table does not include actions that are in progress.

pending_action

Primary

target_entity_id

false

false

The oid of the target entity.

involved_entities

bigint[]

true

false

The oids of the involved entities (includes the target entity).

description

text

false

false

The text description of the action.

savings

double precision

false

false

Savings (or, if negative, investment) of the action.

attrs

jsonb

true

false

Additional (often type-specific) information for the action.

For example, in resizes this will contain the commodity type and from/to amounts.
